availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Judith L. Goodall Locker. Father of Mary S. Locker, Fanny Locker, John B. Locker, and George Locker. Postmaster in Briensburg, Marshall County, Kentucky from 1858 to 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, unknown district, p. stamped 473. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, unknown district, p. 99. Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971 (National Archives Microfilm Publication, M841, Roll 47: Kentucky, Knox - Marshall Counties), Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, National Archives, Washington D.C., p. 135.
